pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 HZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 combatible
  • Storage: 70 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
